name: Music_2963.wav
keywords: ['harp song', 'male voice', 'violins', 'no percussion', 'folk song', 'slow tempo', 'no vocal modulation', 'loud voice']
caption: This folk song features a male voice singing the main melody. The voice is loud and not modulated. This is accompanied by a violin and a harp. The violins are playing high pitched notes. The harp is playing a repetitive phrase. There is no percussion in the song. This song can be played in a village style movie.
